title: Enable CSM
content:
You need a Service Management Premium license on your tenant to enable and use the CSM feature.

To enable CSM, the tenant admin must complete the following tasks:

  • Activate CSM
  • Assign company to user
  • Update forms
  • Add business rules
  • Add roles

Activate CSM

  1. In the main menu, click Administration > Configuration > Application Settings.
  2. In the Enable Customer Service Management (CSM) field, select On.
  3. Click Save.

Assign company to user

To ensure CSM is working properly all your users must be related to a company. For details about creating or editing a user record, see the Users and contacts page. 

Update forms

This task applies only to tenants who have upgraded from a previous version and are enabling CSM after the upgrade.

In the main menu, click Administration > Studio > Forms. Select Request in the record type drop-down at the top of the screen, and then update the forms as described.

Form Section Action required in Studio Suggested position

serviceRequest Request Details Add the Requested for company field to the section After the Requested by company field
serviceRequest Request Details Add the Product instance field to the section After the Requested by company field
serviceRequest Request Details Add the Product version field to the section After the Requested by company field

Live Support New Request Details Add the Product environment field to the section After the Requested by company field
Live Support New Request Details Add the Entitlement field to the section After the Requested by company field
New Request form Request details Add the Requested by company field to the section After the Requested by field
New Request form Request details Add the Requested for company field to the section After the Requested for field
New Request form Catalog offering Add the Product instance field to the section. After the Offering field.
New Request form Catalog offering Add the Entitlement field to the section. After the Offering field.
withoutResolution Request details Add the Requested by company field to the section After the Requested by field

withoutResolution Classification Add the Product instance field to the section After the Requested asset model field
withoutResolution Classification Add the Entitlement field to the section After the Requested asset model field
withoutResolution Classification Add the Product version field to the section After the Requested asset model field
withoutResolution Classification Add the Product environment field to the section After the Requested asset model field
custom Details Add the Requested by company field to the section After the Requested by field
custom Details Add the Requested for company field to the section After the Requested for field
custom Details Add the Product instance field to the section After the Requested for field
custom Details Add the Product version field to the section After the Requested for field
custom Details Add the Product environment field to the section After the Requested for field
custom Details Add the Entitlement field to the section After the Requested for field

In the main menu, click Administration > Studio > Forms. Select Offering in the record type drop-down at the top of the screen, and then update the forms as described.

Form Section Action required in Studio Suggested position
New Offering Form Offering Details Add the Require Company Information field to the section After the Required entitlement information field
Full Offering Form Offering Details Add the Require Company Information field to the section After the Required entitlement information field
New Offering form Offering details Add the Required entitlement information field to the section After the Required asset information field
Full Offering form Offering details Add the Required entitlement information field to the section After the Required asset information field
Full Offering form Offering details Add the Entitlement filter field to the section After the Required entitlement information field

In the main menu, click Administration > Studio > Forms. Select Article in the record type drop-down at the top of the screen, and then update the forms as described.

Form Section Action required in Studio Suggested position
Full Article form Visibility Add the Entitlement filter field to the section After the Archive on field

In the main menu, click Administration > Studio > Forms. Select Entitlement Rule in the record type drop-down at the top of the screen, and then update the forms as described.

Form Section Action required in Studio Suggested position
Full EntitlementRule form Rule Definition Add the Company field to the section After the Role field
New EntitlementRule form Rule Definition Add the Company field to the section After the Role field

In the main menu, click Administration > Studio > Forms. Select Contract in the record type drop-down at the top of the screen, and then update the forms as described.

Form Section Action required in Studio Suggested position
termsForm Options Add the Support type field to the section NA
termsForm Options Add the Track requests field to the section After the Support type field
termsForm Options Add the Support hours field to the section After the Track requests field
termsForm Options Add the Contracted requests field to the section After the Support hours field
termsForm Options Add the Remaining requests field to the section After the Contracted requests field
termsForm Options Add the Case frequency field to the section After the Remaining requests field

In the main menu, click Administration > Studio > Forms. Select Company in the record type drop-down at the top of the screen, and then update the forms as described.

Form Section Action required in Studio Suggested position

Full Company form Company details Add the Support team field After the Fax field
Full Company form Company details Add the Primary customer contact field After the Fax field
Full Company form Company details Add the Security contact field After the Fax field
Full Company form Company details Add the Industry field After the Fax field

Full Company form Company details Add the Grace period (days) field After the Fax field
Full Company form Company details Add the Domain field After the Fax field
Full Company form Company details Add the External reference field After the Fax field
Full Company form Company details Add the Allow surveys field After the Fax field
Full Company form Company details Add the Allow notifications field After the Fax field

In the main menu, click Administration > Studio > Forms. Select License in the record type drop-down at the top of the screen, and then update the forms as described.

Form Section Action required in Studio Suggested position
New License form License detail Add the License class field to the section Before the Display label field
New License form License detail Add the Consumer company field to the section After the Display label field
Full License form Overview Add the License class field to the section Before the Display label field
Full License form Overview Add the Consumer company field to the section After the Display label field
Full License form Details Add the Has node locking field to the section After the Unit rights field
Full License form Details Add the Sold license type field to the section After the Has node locking field
Full License form Details Add the License based on field to the section After the Sold license type field

For detailed instructions on how to add a field, see Add a field.

Add business rules

This task applies only to tenants who have upgraded from a previous version and are enabling CSM after the upgrade.

Rules to add

Following are the rules to add for the Request record type.

Event Rule Description of the rule
After change
If
${(entity.RequestType == 'CaseRequest' || entity.RequestType == 'SupportRequest' || entity.RequestType == 'ServiceRequest') && current_update.RequestedByPerson.IsChanged && entity.RequestedByPerson != null}
Set
Requested by company :
${entity.RequestedByPerson.Company.Id}
 For case requests, support requests, and service requests, 'Requested by company' is set to the company of the user set as 'Requested by'.
After change If
${((entity.RequestType == 'CaseRequest' || entity.RequestType == 'SupportRequest' || entity.RequestType == 'ServiceRequest') && tenant_settings.ENABLE_CSM_INTEGRATION == true) && entity.RequestsOffering.RequireCompanyInfo == true}
Define
Requested by company , Requested for company
as mandatory		 For case requests, support requests, and service requests with CSM setting enabled and 'Require Company Information' set to true, both 'Requested by Company' and 'Requested for Company' must be specified.
After change If
${(entity.RequestsOffering.OfferingType == 'CaseOffering' || entity.RequestsOffering.OfferingType == 'SupportOffering' || entity.RequestsOffering.OfferingType == 'ServiceOffering') && entity.RequestsOffering.RequiredCaseInfo == 'ProductAndEntitlement'}
Define
Entitlement
as mandatory		 'Entitlement' is a required field if the selected offering is a case offering, support offering, or service offering, and 'Required entitlement information' of the offering is set to 'Product and Entitlement'.
After change If
${(entity.RequestsOffering.OfferingType == 'CaseOffering' || entity.RequestsOffering.OfferingType == 'SupportOffering' || entity.RequestsOffering.OfferingType == 'ServiceOffering') && (entity.RequestsOffering.RequiredCaseInfo == 'Product' || entity.RequestsOffering.RequiredCaseInfo == 'ProductAndEntitlement')}
Define
Product instance
as mandatory		 'Product instance' is a required field if the selected offering is a case offering, support offering, or service offering, and 'Required entitlement information' of the offering is set to 'Product and Entitlement' or 'Product'.
After change If
${(entity.RequestType == 'CaseRequest' || entity.RequestType == 'SupportRequest' || entity.RequestType == 'ServiceRequest') && tenant_settings.ENABLE_CSM_INTEGRATION == true && current_update.ProductInstance.IsChanged && entity.ProductInstance != null && entity.ProductInstance.Environment != null}
Set
Product environment :
${entity.ProductInstance.Environment.Id}		 For case requests, support requests, and service requests with CSM setting enabled, 'Environment' is set to the selected product instance's environment.
After change If
${(entity.RequestType == 'CaseRequest' || entity.RequestType == 'SupportRequest' || entity.RequestType == 'ServiceRequest') && tenant_settings.ENABLE_CSM_INTEGRATION == true && current_update.ProductInstance.IsChanged && entity.ProductInstance != null && entity.ProductInstance.Version != null && entity.ProductVersion == null}
Set
Product version :
${entity.ProductInstance.Version.Id}		 For case requests, support requests, and service requests with CSM setting enabled, 'Version' is by default set to the selected product instance's version, but can be changed to one of the values listed in the dropdown.
After change If
${(entity.RequestType == 'CaseRequest' || entity.RequestType == 'SupportRequest' || entity.RequestType == 'ServiceRequest') && tenant_settings.ENABLE_CSM_INTEGRATION == true && current_update.RequestedByCompany.IsChanged && (entity.RequestedByCompany != null && entity.RequestToCompany != null && entity.RequestedByCompany.Id != entity.RequestToCompany.Id && !has_matching_related_company(entity.RequestedByCompany, entity.RequestToCompany, union('Forward:MSP','Backward:Partner'), true, entity.RequestedByPerson, entity.RequestsOffering))}
Set
Requested for company :
${null}		 Verifies that, for case requests, support requests, and service requests with CSM setting enabled, the company set as 'Requested by company' is authorized to request on behalf of the company set as 'Requested for company'. If not authorized, 'Requested for company' is reset to match 'Requested by company'.
After change If
${(entity.RequestType == 'CaseRequest' || entity.RequestType == 'SupportRequest' || entity.RequestType == 'ServiceRequest') && tenant_settings.ENABLE_CSM_INTEGRATION == true && current_update.RequestToCompany.IsChanged && entity.ProductInstance != null && entity.RequestedByCompany != null && entity.RequestedByPerson != null}
Validate
${has_matching_entitled_item('Product', 'Create', entity.RequestsOffering, entity.RequestedByPerson, entity.RequestedByCompany, entity.RequestToCompany, entity.ProductInstance)}
and display
Invalid product instance selected
in case of a failure		 Verifies that, for case requests, support requests, and service requests with CSM setting enabled, the user set as 'Requested by', the company set as 'Requested by company', and the company set as 'Requested for company' are authorized to raise a case request for the selected product instance.
After change If
${(entity.RequestType == 'CaseRequest' || entity.RequestType == 'SupportRequest' || entity.RequestType == 'ServiceRequest') && tenant_settings.ENABLE_CSM_INTEGRATION == true && current_update.RequestToCompany.IsChanged && entity.ProductInstance != null && entity.Entitlement != null && entity.RequestedByCompany != null && entity.RequestedByPerson != null}
Validate
${has_matching_entitlement('Product', 'Create', entity.RequestsOffering, entity.RequestedByPerson, entity.RequestedByCompany, entity.RequestToCompany, entity.ProductInstance, entity.Entitlement)}
and display
Invalid entitlement selected
in case of a failure		 Verifies that, for case requests, support requests, and service requests with CSM setting enabled, the user set as 'Requested by', the company set as 'Requested by company', and the company set as 'Requested for company' are authorized to raise a case request for the selected entitlement.
After change If
${(entity.RequestType == 'CaseRequest' || entity.RequestType == 'SupportRequest' || entity.RequestType == 'ServiceRequest') && current_flow.IsPortalFlow && entity.RequestedByCompany == null}
Set
Requested by company :
${current_user.Company}		 When a case request, support request, or service request is created through the Self-service portal, 'Requested by' is set to the current user.
Rendering forms If
${entity.RequestType != 'CaseRequest' && entity.RequestType != 'SupportRequest' && entity.RequestType != 'ServiceRequest'}
Hide fields
Entitlement , Product instance , Requested by company , Requested for company , Product version , Product environment		 Hide the 'Entitlement', 'Product instance', 'Requested by company', 'Requested for company', 'Product version' and 'Product environment' fields if the request type is not 'Case Request', 'Support Request', or 'Service Request'.
Rendering forms
If
${entity.RequestType == 'HRRequest' || (entity.RequestsOffering != null && entity.RequestsOffering.OfferingType == 'HumanResourceOffering') || (entity.RequestsOffering != null && entity.RequestsOffering.RequiredCaseInfo == null) || tenant_settings.ENABLE_CSM_INTEGRATION == false}
Hide fields
Entitlement, Product instance, Product version, Product environment
 For HR requests, hide the 'Entitlement', 'Product instance', 'Product version', and 'Product environment' fields if the request type is HR, or if the selected offering is a Human Resource offering, or if the offering does not specify 'Required entitlement information', or if the CSM setting is not enabled.
Rendering forms

If

${(entity.RequestType == 'CaseRequest' || entity.RequestType == 'SupportRequest'|| entity.RequestType == 'ServiceRequest') && tenant_settings.ENABLE_CSM_INTEGRATION == true && entity.RequestedByCompany != null && (entity.RequestsOffering.RequiredCaseInfo == null || count_collection(lookup_entitled_items('Product', 'Create', entity.RequestsOffering, entity.RequestedByPerson, entity.RequestedByCompany, entity.RequestedByCompany)) > 0)}

Define suggested values for

Requested for company

with header

Own company

with filter

Id IN ${entity.RequestedByCompany.Id}

with association to

field(optional)

 For case requests, support requests, and service requests with CSM setting enabled, if the user specified in the 'Requested by' field is entitled to raise a request on behalf of their company for the specified product instance using the specified offering and entitlement, then display the user's company under the 'Own company' section in the 'Requested for company' dropdown.
Rendering forms If
${(entity.RequestType == 'CaseRequest' || entity.RequestType == 'SupportRequest' || entity.RequestType == 'ServiceRequest') && entity.RequestedByCompany != null && tenant_settings.ENABLE_CSM_INTEGRATION == true}
Define suggested values for
Requested for company
with header
Related companies
with filter
Id IN ${related_companies(entity.RequestedByCompany, union('Forward:MSP','Backward:Partner'), true, entity.RequestedByPerson, entity.RequestsOffering)}
with association tofield(optional)		 For case requests, support requests, and service requests with CSM setting enabled, list the related companies of 'Requested by company' in the 'Requested for company' dropdown.
Rendering forms
Define suggested values for
Product instance
with header
Products 
with filter
Id IN ${lookup_entitled_items('Product', 'Create', entity.RequestsOffering, entity.RequestedByPerson, entity.RequestedByCompany, entity.RequestToCompany)} PhaseId IN ${union('pInUse','pExpiring')}
with association to field(optional)
 List product instances in the 'Product instance' dropdown, under the header 'Products', that the 'Requested by' user or company is entitled to, and that are in the 'In Use' or 'Expiring' phases.
Rendering forms
Define suggested values for
Entitlement
with header
Entitlements
with filter
Id IN ${lookup_entitlements('Product', 'Create', entity.RequestsOffering, entity.RequestedByPerson, entity.RequestedByCompany, entity.RequestToCompany, entity.ProductInstance)} PhaseId IN ${union('Inuse', 'Deactivating')}
with association to field(optional)
 List entitlements in the 'Entitlement' dropdown, under the header 'Entitlements', that are associated with the selected product instance, that the 'Requested by' user or company is entitled to for creating the request, and that are in the 'In Use' or 'Deactivating' phases.
Rendering forms If
${(entity.RequestType == 'CaseRequest' || entity.RequestType == 'SupportRequest' || entity.RequestType == 'ServiceRequest')}
Disable
Requested by company , Product environment		 Disable 'Requested by company' and 'Product environment' fields if the request type is 'Case Request', 'Support Request', or 'Service Request' .
Rendering forms If
${(entity.RequestType == 'CaseRequest' || entity.RequestType == 'SupportRequest' || entity.RequestType == 'ServiceRequest') && tenant_settings.ENABLE_CSM_INTEGRATION == true && entity.ProductInstance == null}
Disable
Product version		 For case requests, support requests, and service requests with CSM setting enabled, disable 'Product version' field if the 'Product instance' is not set.
Rendering forms If
${(entity.RequestType == 'CaseRequest' || entity.RequestType == 'SupportRequest' || entity.RequestType == 'ServiceRequest') && tenant_settings.ENABLE_CSM_INTEGRATION == true && entity.ProductInstance != null}
Define suggested values for
Product version
with header
Current product version
with filter
Id IN ${entity.ProductInstance.Version.Id}
with association tofield(optional)		 For case requests, support requests, and service requests with CSM setting enabled, in the 'Product version' dropdown, list the current version of the selected 'Product instance'.
Rendering forms If
${(entity.RequestType == 'CaseRequest' || entity.RequestType == 'SupportRequest' || entity.RequestType == 'ServiceRequest') && tenant_settings.ENABLE_CSM_INTEGRATION == true && entity.ProductInstance != null}
Define suggested values for
Product version
with header
Available product versions
with filter
ProductModel IN ${entity.ProductInstance.ProductModel.Id}
Id NOT IN ${entity.ProductInstance.Version.Id}		 For case requests, support requests, and service requests with CSM setting enabled, in the 'Product version' dropdown, list the available versions of the selected 'Product instance'.
Rendering forms If
${entity.RequestType == 'CaseRequest'}
Hide fields
Deliver location , Report location , Action type , Requested for , Service component , Privacy , Requested asset model		 Hide the 'Deliver location', 'Report location', 'Action type', 'Requested for', 'Service component', 'Privacy' and 'Requested asset model' fields for case requests.

Rendering forms

If

${tenant_settings.ENABLE_CSM_INTEGRATION == false}
Hide fieldsEntitlement filter
Rendering forms Define suggested values forEntitlement filterbased on values ofEntitlement filteraccording tomapping definitionwith defaultEntitled products

with header

Id NOT IN ${union(entity.CompanyFrom.Id, related_companies(entity.CompanyFrom, union('Forward', 'Backward')))}

with association tofield(optional)

Set
Cost center :${null}
License model :${null}
Cost type :${null}
...
After change If
${entity.LicenseClass == 'SoldLicense'}
Define
Display labelas mandatory
After change If
${entity.LicenseClass == 'SoldLicense'}
Define
Consumer companyas mandatory
After change DefineLicense classas mandatory
Rendering forms If
${(entity.Perpetual == false || entity.Perpetual == null) && null == lookup('License', 'Id', 'UpgradeTo.Id', entity.Id)}
Hide tab

Rendering forms If
${entity.AcquisitionType == 'Rental' || entity.AcquisitionType == 'Lease' || entity.AcquisitionType == 'Loan'}
InfinancialFormhide sectionFixed assets

${entity.LicenseClass == 'SoldLicense'}
InfinancialFormhide sectionCost
Rendering forms If
${entity.LicenseClass == 'SoldLicense'}

License metric , License model , Asset tag , Upgrade license , Receiving line , Purchase order

${entity.LicenseClass != 'SoldLicense'}

Consumer company , Sold license type

Consumer company

Following are the rules to update for the Article record type.

Event Rule
Rendering forms
If
${tenant_settings.ENABLE_CSM_INTEGRATION == false}
Hide fieldsEntitlement filter
Rendering forms Define suggested values forEntitlement filterbased on values ofEntitlement filteraccording tomapping definitionwith defaultEntitled products

Following are the rules to add for the Contract record type.

Event Rule Description of the rule
Rendering forms If
${entity.ContractType != 'ServiceContract' && entity.ContractType != 'MaintenanceContract' && entity.ContractType != 'PurchaseContract'}
In
termsFormhide sectionOptions		 Hide Options section in Terms and Conditions

Following are the rules to add for the Company record type.

Event Rule Description of the rule
After change Validate
${entity.GracePeriod == null || entity.GracePeriod >= 0}
and display
Company grace period must be a positive integer.
in case of a failure		 Validates that the grace period is a positive integer.
Rendering forms Define suggested values for
Primary customer contactwith header
Primary customer contact
with filter
Company IN ${entity.Id}with association to field(optional)		 NA
Rendering forms
Define suggested values for
Security contact
with header
Security contact
with filter
Company IN ${entity.Id}with association to field(optional)
 NA

How to add the rules

  1. In the main menu, click Administration > Studio > Processes and Rules.
  2. Select record type from the drop-down menu at the top of the screen.
  3. Click the Standard mode/Comparison mode toggle button to switch to Comparison mode. The CURRENT WORKFLOW pane displays the existing rules and processes in your system. The OUT-OF-THE-BOX WORKFLOW pane displays the rules and processes that are new or modified in this version.
  4. Enter the rule description in the search box to find the rule. The rule will appear in theOUT-OF-THE-BOX WORKFLOW pane.
  5. Click Update rule.

Add roles

In this release, no CSM-related roles are provided out-of-the-box. Tenant Admin users have full access to all features, including CSM entities. To enable non-Tenant Admin users to access CSM entities, update an existing role or create a new role, such as a CSM Admin, and assign the required permissions. For details, see the Create CSM Admin role page.

Review and configure Portal entity filters

See Review and configure Portal entity filters.
